report.title: Species and occurrence counts by site
report.description: Lists locations and the number of species and occurrences within them. This report relies on the record being input with a link to the site and will not pick up records where the spatial reference is in the site boundary but without a direct reference to the site.
report.query: WITH RECURSIVE search_samples(top_id, id, location_id, survey_id, date_start, date_end, depth) AS ( SELECT s.id, s.id, s.location_id, s.survey_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, 1 FROM samples s WHERE s.deleted=false UNION ALL SELECT ss.id, s.id, ss.location_id, ss.survey_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, ss.depth+1 FROM samples s, search_samples ss WHERE s.parent_id = ss.id AND s.deleted=false ) SELECT #columns# FROM websites w JOIN surveys su on su.website_id=w.id JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.website_id=w.id and lw.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON l.id=lw.location_id and l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms ttl1 JOIN termlists_terms ttl2 ON ttl2.meaning_id=ttl1.meaning_id and ttl2.deleted=false JOIN terms t ON t.id=ttl2.term_id and t.deleted=false ) ON ttl1.id=l.location_type_id and ttl1.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (search_samples s JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted='f' JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN taxa tx ON tx.id=ttl.taxon_id AND tx.deleted=false ) on s.survey_id=su.id AND s.location_id=l.id #joins# WHERE w.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (o.zero_abundance='f' OR o.id IS NULL) AND (CAST(su.id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR t.term='#location_type_id#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
